pages.title: Vault Pole
pages.text: The vault pole is a mobility item that lets you vault forward when on or very close to the ground. $(br2) It also lets you fall from a higher height without taking damage.

pages.title: Composite Mesh
pages.text: Compacting paper, wheat and spruce sap gets you composite mesh, which is useful in a few recipes later.

pages.title: Sponge
pages.text: Using composite mesh and dried kelp, you can craft sponges. Very useful for mopping up water and draining submerged caves.
Diving boots let you sink quicker underwater while loosing the ability to swim.
The diving helmet lets you break blocks underwater at a faster rate and increases underwater vision.
A Backtank can be equipped to allow breathing underwater. User must also wear a copper diving helmet. $(br)Must be filled with air by receiving rotation while placed down.

pages.title: Sea Lanterns
pages.text: Underwater caves can be dark and need lighting. In case you're wondering, submerged caves can have magma blocks in them.

pages.title: Cheaper Lanterns
pages.text: Lanterns are much cheaper to make now.
